Formula.name: Formula
Formula.hint: The formula that will be added to the chat.

Row.name: Row
Row.hint: The row the button will be placed on.

Label.name: Label
Label.hint: The label shown in case the dice has no image.

Tooltip.name: Tooltip
Tooltip.hint: The tooltip shown when hovering over the button. Defaults to the Formula.

Color.name: Color
Color.hint: The color that fills the image.

compactMode.label: Compact Mode
compactMode.hint: Disables any additional dice rows and merges the original two rows together.

DiceRows.Instruction1: Click any dice button to edit it. Right-Click any dice button to delete it.

autoOpenPopout.name: Auto Open Popout
autoOpenPopout.hint: Opens the Dice Tray popout automatically on page load.

enableDiceTray.name: Enable Dice Tray
enableDiceTray.hint: Enable showing a dice tray below the chat message area. This is a user setting for players that don't want the tray.

popout.name: Dice Tray Popout Button
popout.hint: Adds a button on the Controls bar to toggle the Dice Tray popout. You can also toggle the popout by setting a keybinding.

rightClickCommand.name: Right Click Command
rightClickCommand.hint: Sets which behavior right-clicking a dice button should have.

flatCheck.name: Add Flat Check Buttons
flatCheck.hint: Replaces the Fortune/Misfortune buttons for DC 5/11 Flat Check buttons.

wildDieBehavior.name: Use Dice Pool for Wild Button
wildDieBehavior.hint: Clicking the same dice while Wild is active will add dice to the pool rather than increasing the current dice in the list.
